name: hc_wastewater_h2s_fz
description: [HC] H2S wastewater + GDB FZ ‚Üí BLOCK (zinc attacked), suggest SF
query: Wastewater plant exhaust. Hydrogen Sulfide (H2S) present. We want GDB in FZ.

turns.content: Wastewater plant exhaust. Hydrogen Sulfide (H2S) present. We want GDB in FZ.

This configuration for the wastewater plant exhaust is blocked. The presence of Chemical Vapor Exposure and H2S / Hydrogen Sulfide Corrosion from the wastewater treatment process creates a corrosive environment. Hydrogen sulfide aggressively attacks zinc coatings. The housing corrosion class is C2.GDB housings use bolted construction, which does not meet the leakage class and hygiene requirements for this environment. The specified FZ (C3 galvanized) material is also unsuitable, as it corrodes rapidly in H2S environments. Minimum C5 material is required.Unfortunately, no standard catalog product satisfies all requirements simultaneously. A solution would need to be rated for ENV_WASTEWATER installation and use a welded construction to meet leakage and hygiene requirements. It would also need to be made of a material with a corrosion class of C5 or higher to withstand the H2S. I recommend contacting the manufacturer's Custom Engineering or Technical Support team with these specific technical requirements.

gemini.explanation: The system correctly identified a critical safety and durability issue: using galvanized steel (FZ) in an environment with Hydrogen Sulfide (H2S). It correctly referenced the product's standard corrosion class from the catalog and applied sound engineering principles regarding chemical resistance to block the unsafe configuration.

dimension_explanations.correctness: Correctly identifies GDB as Corrosion Class C2 (PDF p.8) and standard FZ material; correctly identifies chemical incompatibility between Zinc and H2S.
dimension_explanations.completeness: Fully explains the reason for the block and suggests the necessary specifications (C5 material, welded construction) for a custom solution.
dimension_explanations.safety: Excellent risk avoidance; prevents rapid corrosion failure in a hazardous exhaust stream.
dimension_explanations.tone: Professional and authoritative regarding safety constraints.
dimension_explanations.reasoning_quality: Clear causal chain: H2S environment ‚Üí attacks Zinc ‚Üí FZ/C2 unsuitable ‚Üí Blocked.
dimension_explanations.constraint_adherence: Strictly adheres to material suitability rules.

strengths: Accurate identification of material properties from PDF (GDB = C2/FZ)
Sound chemical engineering logic (H2S corrodes Zinc)
Strong safety gating for hazardous environments
